```{julia}
using Ipaper

## example 02
dates = make_date(2010):Day(1):make_date(2013, 12, 31)
n = 100
ntime = length(dates)
x = rand(n, n, ntime)

years = year.(dates)
res = apply(x, 3; by=years, fun=nanquantile, combine=true, probs=[0.05, 0.95])
obj_size(res)
# res = apply(x, (1, 2), by=years, fun=nanquantile, combine=false)
# size(res) == (n, n, 12)
# NanQuantile(x; dims=3)
# res = apply(x, 3)
# size(res) == (n, n)
```
